Projects.title: Algobot
Projects.description: A simple bot to organize students into courses
Projects.results: Improve the organization and students-teacher communication in 30%

Projects.title: Portfolio
Projects.description: Hey there! This website? Yep, I built it from scratch, and you're right in the middle of it! It's where you'll witness all the cool stuff I'm working on as I level up my web development skills. So, expect it to change and grow along with me as I tinker with new projects and make the web more awesome!

Projects.title: CountDown Timer
Projects.description: Countdown companion designed to keep you on track and excited for upcoming events, milestones, and deadlines. In this case, is just demostrative so you can't manage time just see how it works

Projects.title: TaskMaster
Projects.description: TaskMaster is a comprehensive todo application designed to help users efficiently manage their tasks and boost productivity. With its intuitive interface and powerful features, TaskMaster simplifies task organization and prioritization, allowing users to stay focused and achieve their goals effectively.

Projects.title: IP Tracker
Projects.description: Your all-in-one solution for monitoring and tracking IPs and domains with ease and precision. With TrackNet, gain valuable insights into online activities, security threats, and domain ownership like never before.
Projects.tech: React, Vite, SASS, LeafletJS and IP Geolocation API

Projects.title: JobNest
Projects.description: Discover JobNest, the ultimate tool for streamlining your job search. With customizable filters and a sleek interface, find your next career move effortlessly. Powered by JavaScript, JobNest is your go-to platform for efficient job hunting.

Projects.title: Shortly
Projects.description: Introducing Shortly, your solution for quick and hassle-free link shortening. Built with React and integrated with the cleanURI API, Shortly empowers you to shorten links with ease. Simplify sharing and tracking links effortlessly with Shortly. Your shortcut to seamless web navigation.

Projects.title: Chat app CSS Illustration
Projects.description: Embarking on this captivating project pushed my CSS skills to new heights as I creatively 'draw' everything using SASS.

Projects.title: Laboratory My Day App
Projects.description: Diving into this intriguing challenge, I encountered a plethora of issues waiting to be conquered. From crafting a seamless to-do list to mastering the intricacies of local storage, each obstacle presented an opportunity for growth and innovation. My journey was not just about problem-solving; it was about embracing the thrill of unraveling complexities and turning them into triumphs.

Projects.title: Social links profile
Projects.description: Are you ready to connect? Your gateway to reaching out and sparking conversations with me awaits right here. Explore my array of social media platforms, where each click brings you closer to initiating a dialogue. Don't hesitate to drop a hello üëãüèΩ‚ÄîI'm eagerly anticipating our interaction!

Projects.title: EarthQuestion
Projects.description: This app is specifically designed for individuals who are passionate about flags and maps. It serves as an excellent tool for skill enhancement and friendly challenges. Currently, it is being utilized in an educational setting to support certain classes, facilitating skill development among students. The app was developed using React and Vite, incorporating Tailwind CSS, and it relies on a public API to access country information.

Projects.title: QuoteVerse
Projects.description: Do you want to hear the wisdom of famous people or seek inspiration? Allow me to introduce QuoteVerse, where you can discover a plethora of quotes from some of the most prominent and accomplished individuals in the world, including Steve Jobs, Albert Einstein, Winston Churchill, and Jeanne Moreau. This platform was crafted using React and Vite, incorporating Tailwind CSS and an API to provide access to quotes and their respective authors.

Projects.title: ToDoGo
Projects.description: This app is designed to assist you in your daily routine. You can easily add your daily tasks, filter them by completed or pending status, and even delete all tasks when they are no longer needed. The app is developed using React, Vite, Tailwind, and Material-UI (MUI).

Projects.title: House Finder
Projects.description: Welcome to our website, where you can search for houses in Finland using our database. Think of it as your own mini Airbnb, tailored specifically for finding accommodations in Finland. Whether you're planning a trip, looking for a place to stay, or exploring various housing options, our platform is here to help you discover your ideal living space in this beautiful Scandinavian country.
Projects.tech: React, Styled components, UUID, MUI and Axios

Projects.title: Enkripto
Projects.description: This is an app that allows you to encrypt your messages and decode your messages, using some keys that are in the repository
